title: Genesis Chapter 17 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 17 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: What did Ishmael do in Genesis 17:20?
options: Built an altar to the Lord
Blessed him, and will make him fruitful
questions.correctAnswer: Blessed him, and will make him fruitful
questions.explanation: Genesis 17:20 states: "And as for Ishmael, I have heard thee: Behold, I have blessed him, and will make him fruitful, and will multiply him ..."

questions.question: According to Genesis 17:9, who said unto Abraham?
questions.explanation: Genesis 17:9 states: "And God said unto Abraham, Thou shalt keep my covenant therefore, thou, and thy seed after thee in their generations."

questions.question: According to Genesis 17:15, who said unto Abraham?
questions.explanation: Genesis 17:15 states: "And God said unto Abraham, As for Sarai thy wife, thou shalt not call her name Sarai, but Sarah shall her name be."

questions.question: Who said "in his heart, Shall a child be born unto him that is an hundred years old? an..." in Genesis 17:17?
questions.explanation: Genesis 17:17 states: "Then Abraham fell upon his face, and laughed, and said in his heart, Shall a child be born unto him that is an hundre..."

questions.question: According to Genesis 17:18, who said unto God?
questions.explanation: Genesis 17:18 states: "And Abraham said unto God, O that Ishmael might live before thee!"

questions.question: Who said "unto God, O that Ishmael might live before thee!" in Genesis 17:18?
questions.explanation: Genesis 17:18 states: "And Abraham said unto God, O that Ishmael might live before thee!"

questions.question: According to Genesis 17:23, who took Ishmael his son?
questions.explanation: Genesis 17:23 states: "And Abraham took Ishmael his son, and all that were born in his house, and all that were bought with his money, every..."

questions.question: According to Genesis 17:24, who was ninety years old and nine?
questions.explanation: Genesis 17:24 states: "And Abraham was ninety years old and nine, when he was circumcised in the flesh of his foreskin."

questions.question: What location is mentioned in Genesis 17:8?
questions.explanation: Genesis 17:8 states: "And I will give unto thee, and to thy seed after thee, the land wherein thou art a stranger, all the land of Canaan, ..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 17:1: "And when ______ was ninety years old and nine, the LORD appeared to ______, and said unto him, I am the Almighty God; walk before me, and be thou p..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And when Abram was ninety years old and nine, the LORD appeared to Abram, and said unto him, I am the Almighty God; w..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 17:2: "And I will ______ my covenant between me and thee, and will multiply thee exceedingly ."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And I will make my covenant between me and thee, and will multiply thee exceedingly ."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 17:3: "And ______ fell on his face: and God talked with him, saying,"
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Abram fell on his face: and God talked with him, saying,"

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 17:4: "As for me, ______, my covenant is with thee, and thou shalt be a father of many nations."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "As for me, behold, my covenant is with thee, and thou shalt be a father of many nations."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 17:5: "Neither shall thy name any more be called Abram, but thy name shall be ______; for a father of many nations have I made thee."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "Neither shall thy name any more be called Abram, but thy name shall be Abraham; for a father of many nations have I m..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 17:6: "And I will ______ thee exceeding fruitful, and I will ______ nations of thee, and kings shall come out of thee."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And I will make thee exceeding fruitful, and I will make nations of thee, and kings shall come out of thee."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 17:7: "And I will ______ my covenant between me and thee and thy seed after thee in their generations for an everlasting covenant, to be a God unto thee, ..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And I will establish my covenant between me and thee and thy seed after thee in their generations for an everlasting ..."
